description: This course will cover a selection of topics from the following fields: a) Microeconometric Theory; b) Macroeconometric Theory; c) Applied Macroeconometric; d) Applied Microeconometric; e) Treatment effects; f) Simulation methods; g) Productivity and Efficiency Analysis; h) Operations research; i) Financial Econometrics; j) Spatial Econometrics; k) Time Series Econometrics
restricted: This course is restricted to students enrolled in the PhD
